Nasa astronauts Christina Koch and Jessica Meir have made history by completing the first ever all-female spacewalk.
They spent seven hours outside the International Space Station (ISS) replacing a failed power control unit.

articles.title: Photographer's Up-Close Images of Animal Eyes Will Have You Seeing Wildlife in a Whole New Way - Mental Floss
articles.description: Armenian photographer Suren Manvelyan won't reveal his secret technique, but his new type of wildlife photography—up-close animal eye shots—is a sight to see.
